summary: This document is a prison administrative record regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein, indicating he is being taken off psych observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate. It notes his suicide watch and psych observation status as 'None'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as inmate #76318-054 who is being taken off psych observation and needs appropriate cellmate assignment.

events.title: Epstein removed from psych observation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off psych observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.

keyFacts: Epstein was being taken off psych observation status.
The document indicates he needed to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.
Both suicide watch and psych observation were marked as 'None' at the time of this record.
